# canZoomOut

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the user can view an expanded area and zoom out.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canZoomOut: Bool { get }
```

## Zooming in a PDF View

- **zoomIn(_:)**: Zooms in by increasing the scaling factor.
- **canZoomIn**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the user can magnify the view and zoom in.
- **zoomOut(_:)**: Zooms out by decreasing the scaling factor.
